TextBlock.Text: NESIA: Unfortunately, this body may simply be too small for any effective structures to be built here.
OKALIS: It may still have some use. For instance, I believe that this rock may be showing us a possible escape!
NESIA: I would caution you against raising your hopes, Okalis, we have already seen that this environment is far from easy to navigate.
SENNETTI: Okalis might be correct! Looking past this wall, I can just barely make out a place where the wooden wall seems to end!
AZOLLA: If this is true, we should investigate immediately. Escaping this place is our first step towards finding the <color=orange>Eye</color>.
